content: c3b sm k6 row 8 repeat row 2 repeat row 1 8 until piece measures 19 or desired length to fit snuggly around the head from beginning ending on a wrong side row with row 8 being the finishing row cast off in pattern leaving a 12 long end for sewing both ends of the headband together stitch both ends of the band together using mattress stitch to complete your headband 3 © wendy poole 2023 for personal use only www wendypoole com
